Bash(python3 -c "import sys, json; data = json.load\(sys.stdin\); print\(f''Total nodes found: {len\(data.get\(""nodes"", {}\)\)}''\); nodes = list\(data.get\(''nodes'', {}\).values\(\)\)[:10]; [print\(f""  - {n.get\(''label'', ''unknown''\)}""\) for n in nodes]")

Bash(python3 -c "
import sys, json
data = json.load\(sys.stdin\)
nodes = data.get\(''nodes'', {}\)

# Group by category
honeypots = []
observers = []
others = []

for k, v in nodes.items\(\):
    label = v.get\(''label'', ''unknown''\)
    tables = v.get\(''tables'', []\)
    role = ''''
    for table in tables:
        if table.get\(''id''\) == ''kubernetes_labels_'':
            for row in table.get\(''rows'', []\):
                if row.get\(''id''\) == ''label_scope.weave.works/role'':
                    role = row.get\(''entries'', {}\).get\(''value'', ''''\)
    
    if role == ''honeypot'':
        honeypots.append\(label\)
    elif role == ''observer'':
        observers.append\(label\)
    elif ''pseudo'' not in v.get\(''id'', ''''\):
        others.append\(label\)

print\(\)
print\(''üçØ HONEYPOTS \(Decoys\):''\)
for h in honeypots:
    print\(f''   ‚Ä¢ {h}''\)
print\(\)
print\(''üëÅÔ∏è  OBSERVERS \(Monitoring\):''\)
for o in observers:
    print\(f''   ‚Ä¢ {o}''\)
print\(\)
print\(''üì¶ OTHER PODS:''\)
for o in sorted\(others\)[:10]:
    print\(f''   ‚Ä¢ {o}''\)
print\(\)
print\(f''Total: {len\(nodes\)} nodes in topology''\)
")
Bash(# Check topology again curl -s http://localhost:4040/api/topology/pods)

Bash(python3 -c "
import sys, json
data = json.load\(sys.stdin\)
nodes = data.get\(''nodes'', {}\)

print\(''‚ïî‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïó''\)
print\(''‚ïë         CURRENT WEAVE SCOPE TOPOLOGY                         ‚ïë''\)
print\(''‚ïö‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïù''\)
print\(\)

# Find attacker
for node_id, node in nodes.items\(\):
    label = node.get\(''label'', ''''\)
    adjacency = node.get\(''adjacency'', []\)
    
    if ''attacker'' in label.lower\(\):
        print\(f''üî¥ ATTACKER: {label}''\)
        print\(f''   Outbound connections to:''\)
        for target_id in adjacency:
            for nid, n in nodes.items\(\):
                if nid == target_id:
                    print\(f''      ‚Üí {n.get\(""label"", target_id\)}''\)
        print\(\)

# Show all honeypots and their connections
print\(''üçØ HONEYPOT CONNECTIONS:''\)
for node_id, node in nodes.items\(\):
    label = node.get\(''label'', ''''\)
    if ''honeypot'' in label.lower\(\):
        print\(f''   {label}''\)
        # Find who connects to this honeypot
        for other_id, other_node in nodes.items\(\):
            if node_id in other_node.get\(''adjacency'', []\):
                print\(f''      ‚Üê {other_node.get\(""label"", ""unknown""\)} \(INCOMING\)''\)
")

Bash(# Kill any existing port-forward and restart pkill -f ""port-forward.*weave-scope"" || true sleep 1 kubectl port-forward svc/weave-scope 4040:80 -n weave 2>&1 & sleep 3 curl -s http://localhost:4040/api)
Bash(# Use minikube service to access minikube service weave-scope -n weave --url & sleep 3 # Try the localhost port again curl -s http://localhost:4040/api/topology/pods cat /tmp/scope-pods.json)

Bash(# Kill existing port-forwards and start fresh pkill -9 -f ""port-forward"" || true sleep 2 # Start new port-forward nohup kubectl port-forward svc/weave-scope 4040:80 -n weave 2>&1 & sleep 3 # Test connection curl -s --connect-timeout 5 http://127.0.0.1:4040/api/topology/pods)

Bash(# Check all pods now echo ""‚ïî‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïó"" echo ""‚ïë DEMO ENVIRONMENT STATUS ‚ïë"" echo ""‚ïö‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïù"" echo """" echo ""üçØ HONEYPOTS \(Decoys\):"" kubectl get pods -n deception-system -l component=honeypot -o custom-columns=""NAME:.metadata.name,STATUS:.status.phase,IP:.status.podIP"" || \\ kubectl get pods -n deception-system)
Bash(# Use nohup and redirect properly nohup kubectl port-forward svc/weave-scope 4040:80 -n weave 2>&1 & sleep 4 cat /tmp/scope-pf.log echo """" curl -s http://127.0.0.1:4040/api)
